title: When should I go to college for hostel? They said its three days before permanent hostel allocation and when class starts?
content:
I am still so confused about the school's hostel process, they said its 3 days before class starts but they havent given a date or a notification.

I asked the hostel warden and he told me to ask the school, and the school isnt picking up the call

Anyone has an idea when I should leave home for hostel with all my things? Thanks in advance!

P.S. I am starting this year with [B.Tech](https://B.Tech) CSE in RR campus

comments.body: Dude first chill and enjoy your holidays . College will announce starting date once it's done with the second round of PESSAT counseling . You can then go upto 3 days earlier of college start date to hostel .

If you have already booked a room and paid the hostel fees then no worries you can come even just 1-2 days before the class starts. It's not a big process. The big process was actually the booking of the room.
